about_the_game:
Embark on Nyana’s journey to liberate her people in the 2D action-adventure Nyana. Armed with all the trappings one would expect from a metroidvania, Nyana also includes a unique base-building feature that is core to the overall experience.


Nyana’s people have been hunted and subjugated by the will of their magic-wielding Masters. But, in the deepest bowels of this world exists a safe haven hidden within an ancient structure and filled with liberated members of Nyana’s people.

As Nyana liberates more of her people in her journey, they will find their way to this safe haven and bring their own resources to help it continue to flourish. New abilities in Nyana are tied to specific buildings that can be placed in the HUB. And new buildings can only be unlocked by liberating more of Nyana’s people throughout the sprawling world.

Save your people. Build your safe haven. And learn new and crucial abilities that will aid you in your quest to uproot the rule of the Masters once and for all.


Ancient civilizations have risen and fallen in the world of Nyana. Along her journey, Nyana may discover more about these civilizations and even unlock secrets that may have been left behind and forgotten by time.


The liberation of Nyana’s people will not be enough. And so the herculean task of uprooting the Masters’ Imperium will also fall on her. The Imperium stands on the shoulders of five key individuals. Eliminating these five individuals will result in the crumbling of the Masters’ society as they know it.


You are not a hunter in this world. It is best to use enemies to traverse past them as you collect resources. However, through the use of custom-created spells, you can combat and execute those who would stand in the way of your vengeance.

As Nyana liberates her people and grows stronger in the process, she will obtain the power she needs to face off against each of the five key Masters, including the head of the snake, the Imperator.

short_description: Join Nyana on her quest to both shatter the chains that have shackled her people and rebuild their society back up from the brink of extinction. Nyana is a story rich metroidvania set in an oppressive, yet beautifully hand-drawn world.
